ygData.subject: RE: My Yk!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: It kinda depends - my views of what a bard is group support - if I can do it better by staying out of the melee - ie drums for battle buffs/resists, mana
ygData.messageBody:
It kinda depends - my views of what a bard is 'group support' - if I can do
it better by staying out of the melee - ie drums for battle buffs/resists,
mana song, crowd control, what ever - that's what I wanna do. What it
depends on is the level of mob and the rest of your group.

I can be the baby in the group and we are fight red-to-me's - I wanna stay
out of the way of harm and still contribute - if there are real strong tanks
- out come the drums. I can be the highest level in the group and fighting
mainly greens with an occasional blue or 2 - just being there to help my
guild members grow. Then I can be fairly effective in the melee and want the
good weps.

Sylly

-----Original Message-----
From: Dark [mailto:jackal@...]
Sent: Friday, January 07, 2000 9:49 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] My Yk!!!

Of all the people how
often does a bard really melee at that level? A war?
Personally I just think
them lee classes should get the first yak and then a bard
who I still can't
decide what to call it besides bard. They don't seem like a
melee class to
me at high leels butrather a support utility.

Naeeldar
